name: data_collection
description: Information on what data is collected, including types of data (personal, sensitive, etc.).

name: data_usage
description: How the collected data will be used, including purposes for processing.

name: data_sharing
description: Details on whether data is shared with third parties, and under what circumstances.

name: user_rights
description: Information about the rights of individuals regarding their data, such as access, correction, deletion, and portability.

name: consent
description: How consent is obtained from users, including any opt-in or opt-out mechanisms.

name: data_retention
description: Policies regarding how long data is retained and the criteria for determining retention periods.

name: security_measures
description: Information on the security measures in place to protect data from unauthorized access or breaches.

name: international_transfers
description: Clauses related to the transfer of data across borders and compliance with international regulations.

name: cookies_tracking
description: Information on the use of cookies and other tracking technologies, including user options for managing them.

name: policy_updates
description: How and when the privacy policy may be updated, and how users will be informed of changes.

name: contact_info
description: Details on how users can contact the organization for questions or concerns regarding privacy.

name: legal_basis
description: The legal grounds for processing personal data, such as consent, contractual necessity, or legitimate interests.

name: children_privacy
description: Provisions related to the collection of data from minors, if applicable.

name: data_breach_notification
description: Policies regarding how users will be notified in the event of a data breach.

name: third_party_services
description: Information about third-party services that may have access to user data and their privacy practices.
